response.overview: Comic film in which the main character Ahmed struggles with his bad marriage. His wife is tired of the poor and frustrating life with Ahmed and Ahmed also suspects his wife of adultery with a taxi driver. During a bus trip - after yet another argument with his wife - Ahmed's thoughts wander and real events, distorted memories and fantasy merge into an absurd life. He is sent by terrorists to Western Europe and has to wait there for a mission. He gets into hilarious situations and is even confronted by the hated taxi driver.
response.title: Cross Fate
